title: Wellmi supporting educational drive to improve student wellbeing.
description: Cirencester College recently became one of the first educational institutions in the UK to support the physical & mental wellbeing of students and staff with the Wellmi app.

blocks.headingText: Wellmi supporting educational drive to improve student wellbeing.
blocks.text: Cirencester College (UK) recently became one of the first educational institutions in the UK to support the physical & mental wellbeing of students and staff with the Wellmi app.
